extendedInfo.description: The Cleartrip travel booking experience you know and love is now on your Android device. â¢ Book air tickets within India: Find the lowest airfares and book domestic flights using our unique split-screen layout to select and price your flights with just two taps.â¢ Book international flight tickets: The only two-column layout on mobile to combine inbound and outbound international flights without overloading your senses.â¢ Recent searches: Access all your recent searches with just one touch.â¢ All your booked trips: Access your trips and bookings on your mobile, even when youâre offline.â¢ Expressway: One-touch flight bookings on your phone.â¢ Payment options: Pay using your credit card, debit card or net banking.â¢ Saved travellers: Your saved travellers are on your mobile too. No need to type names again and again.â¢ Local currencies: Our customers in GCC countries (Bahrain, Kuwait, Oman, Qatar, Saudi Arabia and UAE) can now pay in their local currencies.â¢ International currencies: See fares in major currencies, including USD, GBP, SGD, CAD, AUD, etc.

reviews.title: Amazing UI and Simple UX
reviews.comment: The UI is just amazing.. and the simple user experience makes it a 5 star app for me. Pus everything works great.
reviews.author: Prateek Jain

reviews.title: Very cool and excellent
reviews.comment: Very useful and intuitive application.
reviews.author: Listin Augustine

reviews.title: Invalid
reviews.comment: After finishing download, the app cannot install. It says \"package file is invalid\"
reviews.author: Yogesh Shrestha

reviews.comment: I used first time in my Z 10 to buy air ticket. In the midst of meeting I finished in 4 mts.Fantastic\tWell recommended
reviews.author: bala bala

reviews.title: Fantastic look and feel
reviews.comment: Just downloaded the app on my nexus one. Needed to book a one way domestic ticket and it took me no more than 3 minutes from start to finish. Very very slick design. Clean. Not crowded. Loved the calendar pop up, swiping between travel dates. Plus! Got a better deal on a flight than compared to the website. Win!
reviews.author: Rakshita Swami

reviews.title: Why
reviews.comment: This was such a smooth, speedy and reliable app for railway bookings. Why have you done this? I\'m uninstalling it now :-[
reviews.author: Mohinder Pratap Singh

reviews.title: App crashes
reviews.comment: This app crashes when going for the payment option using internet banking and is of no use.
reviews.author: Bivin V

reviews.title: A new standard for travel apps
reviews.comment: Cleartrip gets it. The user flow is intuitive. The fonts on tickets are correct. Expressway lets you book in less than 10 seconds. Being a native app, you can check in to airports just by flashing that beautiful ticket on your app.   My friends are sick of me blabbering about Cleartrip.
reviews.author: Amrit Pal

reviews.title: No trains
reviews.comment: Need the train option for india, would be really useful to have this back as im stuffed without it
reviews.author: Alex West

reviews.comment: Its a crap... I am not going to give a single star but Google won\'t allow me\tI sucked with this ... what a. Fishy app it is .. When I click on more options I got 2 options trains n feedback .. If I click on trains again it leads me to play store to instal app again and again .. It is the worst worst worst app I ever used .. Finally I saw a caption \" made with love \" I don\'t think..you made with hell ..but you \"made in hell\"
reviews.author: P M K PAVAN

reviews.comment: Train Bookings Suspended for a while, not in sync with Cleartrip online account\tIRCTC train reservations have been suspended for a while. This seriously sucks. I would love to see them back, as that\'s one of the main reasons I signed up for Cleartrip, other being the lovely UI. Another problem is this is most of the times out of sync with Cleartrip online account. Would rate it 5 stars when these issues are fixed.
reviews.author: Lakshmi Narayanan Gurumurthy

reviews.title: Very helpfull application
reviews.comment: Good work
reviews.author: Hashim Haneefa

reviews.title: Wonderful
reviews.comment: Save alot of time searching through different websites
reviews.author: Saad Bn Muaz

reviews.title: No  multi city booking
reviews.comment: Though the app is really decent enough, but it had dissappointed me as there is no multi city booking feature.
reviews.author: Abida Ali

reviews.title: Samsung galaxy s4
reviews.comment: Excellent app and made my travelling easier
reviews.author: Nikhil Pantham

reviews.title: Usefull
reviews.comment: Great job.
reviews.author: uwais k

reviews.title: BUG
reviews.comment: I am not satisfied with the working of the Mobile app. bec when i am choosing the return type, i am unable to change the return date. This is a bug kindly rectify this......hope to get new app soon
reviews.author: ADIL AMIN Bhat

reviews.title: no flights?
reviews.comment: Shows no flights between Hawaiian islands for days I am looking to travel. Compared with Google Flights and found plenty for the days I am planning. Nice interface, but it is useless if it doesn\'t show accurate flights.
reviews.author: Justin Green

reviews.title: Galaxy S2
reviews.comment: Simply the best. Keep it up!
reviews.author: marvin mermida

reviews.title: Very good and low fares
reviews.comment: Need multi city fares and will rate 5
